title: Planets Fact
description: A website that displays specific information about the planet you've chosen. Data was mapped from a JSON file, and hooks were used to handle states.

title: Maze Generator
description: This project was made in response to a YouTube tutorial. Added a feature that allows the user to specify the number of grids to be rendered.

title: Photosnap
description: A marketing site for a photo-sharing app. Built reusable components using Compound Component pattern.
